Class OptionsUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.closure.plugin.common.OptionsUtils

extends Object
    Utilities for dealing with plexus-configurable options bundles.

    • Method Detail

      • classForName

        public static <ST> com.google.common.base.Optional<Class<? extends ST>> classForName(org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log log,
                                                                                     String name,
                                                                                     Class<ST> superType)
        Best effort to look up a class and ensures that it is a sub-type of the given type.

        Some compilers allow plugging-in customizations by providing an instance of an interface. One way to bridge the gap between that and string flag values or XML plexus configuration elements is by convention -- provide the name of a public concrete class with a public zero-argument constructor that is a sub-type.

        Parameters:
        name - a qualified class name available from this class's class loader.
        superType - a super-type of the class to load.
        Returns:
        some class when that class can be loaded and obeys the type constraints above.

      • createInstanceUsingDefaultConstructor

        public static <T> com.google.common.base.Optional<T> createInstanceUsingDefaultConstructor(org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log log,
                                                                                           Class<T> superType,
                                                                                           Class<?> c)
        Best effort to create an instance of the given class using its default constructor without escalating privileges.

        Returns:
        absent if instance creation failed.

      • keyValueMapFromJson

        public static com.google.common.base.Optional<com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<String,Object>> keyValueMapFromJson(org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log log,
                                                                                                                         String json)
        Best effort to derive a string to primitive value map from a string of JSON text.

      • prepare

        public static <OPTIONS extends Options> com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<OPTIONS> prepare(com.google.common.base.Supplier<OPTIONS> makeDefaultInstance,
                                                                                                 Iterable<? extends OPTIONS> optionSets)
                                                                                          throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Given a series of options, makes sure that their IDs, and thereby their keys, are unambiguous; their Asplodable fields are disjoint; and fields with meaningful defaults have those defaults lazily populated.
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException

      • prepareOne

        public static <OPTIONS extends Options> OPTIONS prepareOne(OPTIONS opts)
                                                    throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Like prepare(com.google.common.base.Supplier<OPTIONS>, java.lang.Iterable<? extends OPTIONS>) but accepts a single non-asploding input.
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
